theme.name: HWS Szenario
theme.description: Zusammenstellung der hydrologischen Bedingungen der Hochwasserereignisse und der topographischen Gegebenheiten des Einsatzgebietes.

objectClass.name: Hydrological situation
objectClass.description: early warning time, hight of peak of floodwave of floodevents (of different annuality)

simpleProperty.name: Name of floodevent (annuality)
simpleProperty.description: Recognisable name (annuality: 30-year flood)) of the hydrological szenario

simpleProperty.name: Annuality
simpleProperty.description: the annuality of the flood event as \"every X years\"

simpleProperty.name: Maximum hight of watertabel [mNN, mMSL]
simpleProperty.description: maximum expected hight of watertabel at absolute altitude [mNN: meters above NN, mMSL: meters above mean sea level]

simpleProperty.name: Early warning time
simpleProperty.description: remaining time between \"setup decicion incident\" and \"activation point\" (i.e. time, at which shelter funciton of the system starts)

vectorSet.name: Topography of the flood protection line
vectorSet.description: Data sets describing the topographic situation, to be used for calculating the necessary hight and area of the protection system

simpleProperty.name: Lenth of \"mean hight\" segment
simpleProperty.description: length of the protection line, where topographic hight stays within an intervall of 0.20 m

simpleProperty.name: Mean hight of length segment [mNN, mMSL]
simpleProperty.description: mean hight of surface of the length segmen, where topographic hight stays within an interval of 0.2 m
